document_data.name: Kargien Dissengulp
document_data.titles: Most Honored Burrow Warden{{Cite digital book/Reclaiming Blingdenstone|3}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Kargien Dissengulp''' was a [[deep gnome]] burrow warden in [[Blingdenstone]].
document_data.History:
Kargien was a burrow warden who had escaped from Blingdenstone in [[1371 DR]].

Circa [[1439 DR]]. he led the first expedition back to the ruins of the city and started reconstruction.

In [[1479 DR]], he was busy trying to clear the city from all hostile factions and so hired adventurers.
document_data.Personality: Kargien liked to be the chief.
